title: The Manhattan Project (1986) [Nuclear bomb] (Quality DVDrip)
description:
Optional English subtitles in separate idx/sub files. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0091472/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0091472/</a>

Amazing story of a teenager who builds a home-made atomic bomb to protest against a nuclear lab contaminating the neighbourhood. 

I found this rare film somewhere on the net and thought the quality was too poor to support it, so I ordered the DVD from the U.S. and made this new quality rip.

Look out for a very young Robert Sean Leonard (then 17) as one of the classmates (Max), later popular in 'Dead Poets Society' and 'Swing Kids', now starring as Dr. James Wilson in the TV series, 'House, M. D.'.

Widescreen, XviD 704x384, good stereo, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in my DivX player.
